Sentencas: Apatite-type lanthanum silicate with a formula of La-10(SiO4)(6)O-3 is a potential candidate electrolyte for SOFC system because of its high ionic conductivity and low activation energy.
Titulo: Assessment of thermochemically stable apatite La10(SiO4)6O3 as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Pure La-10(SiO4)(6)O-3 powder was prepared by solid state reaction and using a suitable thermal pretreatment (1000 degrees C/5 h) of the as-purchased La2O3 powder.
Titulo: Assessment of thermochemically stable apatite La10(SiO4)6O3 as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Materials characterization, thermal behaviors, and electrical properties of La-10(SiO4)(6)O-3 samples were investigated by X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) and two-point probe DC conductivity.
Titulo: Assessment of thermochemically stable apatite La10(SiO4)6O3 as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A pure La-10(SiO4)(6)O-3 pellet was prepared at the sintering process of 1600 degrees C and 2.5 h with a high relative sintered density of 96.91%.
Titulo: Assessment of thermochemically stable apatite La10(SiO4)6O3 as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The existence of secondary phases in La-10(SiO4)(6)O-3 pellet resulted in a lower conductivity than that of pure La-10(SiO4)(6)O-3 pellet.
Titulo: Assessment of thermochemically stable apatite La10(SiO4)6O3 as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Eight-hour reduction-resistant stability tests under reducing atmosphere at the elevated temperature of pure La-10(SiO4)(6)O-3 prepared in this study shows a good thermochemical stability as compared to the well-developed 8 mol% Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 (8YSZ).
Titulo: Assessment of thermochemically stable apatite La10(SiO4)6O3 as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: Assessment of thermochemically stable apatite La10(SiO4)6O3 as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells
